name: Gachi run: Running of the slaves
name_original: Gachi run: Running of the slaves
description:
Furious 3D runner about a pumped-up Gachi. Run as far as possible! Collect Sweets! Set new records and enjoy a great soundtrack. Jumping on trampoline cookies and multi-storey design make the gameplay more exciting.

Key Features


♂ 6 Heroes of The Gachi Universe
♂ Stylized game world!
♂ Selected humor.
♂ Great soundtrack.
♂ Stylized cursor
♂ Hot load ...

Locations


♂ Dungeon ♂
♂ Candy World ♂
